projects.name: BlueApp
projects.description: A recruitment platform powered by AI-driven matching to connect ICT contractors with hiring companies, streamlining candidate discovery and job-description generation using advanced AI technologies.
responsibilities: Designed and developed the mobile version of the recruitment platform
Implemented AI-driven matching algorithms
Integrated AI services for candidate discovery
Streamlined job-description generation process
Enhanced hiring efficiency and accuracy
Modernized CI/CD pipelines using cloud tools
Improved deployment speed and scalability across environments

projects.name: PlayerLinc
projects.description: A global sports engagement platform that connects players, recruiters, and supporters through shared moments and interactions.
responsibilities: Led design and development of proof of concept (POC)
Built minimum viable product (MVP) for mobile application
Established scalable foundation based on business requirements
Designed user interface using Figma
Developed mobile application using React Native and Expo
Implemented database and backend services using Supabase
Contributed to successful project funding approval

projects.name: Athena
projects.description: A healthcare financing solution that enables patients to pay medical expenses in manageable monthly instalments, while ensuring full and timely payments to medical practices.
responsibilities: Developed proof of concept for healthcare financing platform
Designed user interface using Figma
Built frontend application with NextJS and React
Implemented database and backend services using Supabase
Facilitated successful funding proposal creation
Contributed to application development approval and forward momentum

projects.name: ToDo
projects.description: A comprehensive task management platform with robust security features, enabling seamless management of personal, team, and organizational tasks with advanced authentication and real-time collaboration capabilities.
responsibilities: Designed and developed responsive frontend using NextJS and Tailwind CSS
Implemented robust backend architecture with Spring Boot and Java
Integrated Google Authentication and JWT token-based security
Built scalable database design using MongoDB with Redis caching
Containerized application using Docker for deployment flexibility
Created multi-level task management (personal, team, organizational)
Implemented real-time task synchronization and collaboration features

projects.name: 360 Review Application
projects.description: A digital platform that replaced manual Excel-based processes for collecting stakeholder feedback on internal projects, streamlining peer-to-peer evaluations for more efficient and structured performance reviews across teams.
responsibilities: Collaborated with the frontend team to design and implement UI/UX
Replaced manual Excel-based feedback collection processes
Streamlined peer-to-peer evaluation workflows
Enabled efficient and structured performance reviews
Worked with testing and backend teams for integration

projects.name: Claims Management System
projects.description: A platform designed to streamline digital auto insurance claims, enabling most claims to be resolved within a week with integrated in-app and phone-based customer service.
responsibilities: Contributed to optimization and portability of mobile application
Updated key components to enhance performance
Improved cross-device compatibility
Ensured efficient claim initiation and tracking for users
Maintained integrated customer service features

projects.name: FlowIQ
projects.description: A warehouse management system that leverages AI to help forecast and manage costs, profit, and more for small business owners in the Southern African region, with multi-language support for local accessibility.
responsibilities: Developed warehouse management system using NextJS and React
Implemented AI-powered forecasting and cost management features
Created multi-language support for Southern African languages
Built responsive UI using Tailwind CSS for optimal user experience
Designed system to serve small business owners in the region
Developed application as part of funding proposal strategy

projects.name: FlowScan
projects.description: A mobile application that works hand-in-hand with FlowIQ to allow shop owners to scan products and process purchase requests seamlessly, integrated with AI and designed for offline functionality using SQLite.
responsibilities: Developed mobile application using React Native and Expo
Implemented product scanning functionality for shop owners
Created seamless purchase request processing system
Integrated AI capabilities for enhanced product recognition
Implemented SQLite database for offline transaction storage
Built offline-first architecture for reliable operation
Developed application as part of funding proposal strategy

projects.name: Lexi AI
projects.description: A ChatGPT clone specifically designed for law research, featuring billing and subscription management capabilities to support legal professionals in their research and analysis workflows.
responsibilities: Developed ChatGPT-like interface using NextJS
Specialized AI model for law research and analysis
Implemented billing and subscription management system
Integrated Supabase for database and authentication
Created specialized features for legal professionals
Built application to facilitate funding acquisition

projects.name: Sensor Networks
projects.description: An energy monitoring application that uses geyser telemetry data and household energy usage to create leaderboards for different suburbs, providing recommendations through a chatbot for energy savings and detailed device metrics.
responsibilities: Developed cross-platform application using React Native and Expo
Implemented geyser telemetry data collection and analysis
Created household energy usage monitoring system
Built suburb-based leaderboards for energy consumption
Integrated AI-powered chatbot for energy saving recommendations
Provided detailed device metrics and usage analytics
Developed application as part of funding proposal strategy

projects.name: Zendacare
projects.description: An AI-powered healthcare platform that provides patients with AI-generated health recommendations, doctor interactions, and image-based health evaluations, while enabling administrators to analyze metrics, forecast disease spread, and detect health anomalies using advanced AI analytics.
responsibilities: Developed cross-platform application using React Native and Expo
Implemented AI-generated health recommendations for patients
Created patient-doctor interaction platform
Built image-based health evaluation and diagnosis system
Developed admin dashboard with AI-powered analytics
Implemented disease spread forecasting and alert systems
Created anomaly detection algorithms for health data analysis
Built application as part of funding proposal strategy

projects.name: Fresh Grown Point of Sale System
projects.description: An application for supermarkets to facilitate fruit and vegetable sales.
responsibilities: Designed authentication workflow for users
Developed UI components and transactional logic

projects.name: Katekani Country Lodge Website
projects.description: A website showcasing accommodations in Mpumalanga.
responsibilities: Implemented JavaScript logic for dynamic navigation
Developed frontend UI
